alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Deuel; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:07AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Arthur, northwestern Keith, southern Garden and northeastern Deuel Counties through 900 AM MDT... At 807 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oshkosh, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oshkosh, Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Ruthon, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Intersection of Highway 27 and 9 Mile Road, Bluewater Battlefield State Historical Park, Windlass Hill and Sugar Loaf Hill. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
